des:
Villa Smart Home Alexa Skill, Allows you to use Alexa to set thermostats, read temperature sensors and adjust lights & trigger lighting scenes.

For additional questions and for a full list of supported devices, visit www.villasmarthome.com

Lighting Scenes:

Establish the perfect setting for any area of your home, at any time, with a single Alexa command. Scenes are created by synchronizing multiple smart home devices to perform on single command using the Villa app.

"Alexa, Activate Nighttime"

"Alexa, turn on the Goodbye Scene"


Thermostats:

"Alexa, set House Thermostat to 70 degrees."

"Alexa, what is the temperature in the house."


Temperature Sensors and motion sensors with temperature reporting:

"Alexa, what is the temperature of the bedroom sensor."


Lights & Switches:

"Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light."

"Alexa, set Living Room Light to 75 percent."

"Alexa, dim Living Room Light by 50 percent."

"Alexa, Brighten Bedroom Lamp."

To add Villa Smart Home Skill, you must have an Villa customer account and an Activated Villa Controller. Once you have paired your devices to Villa Controller and given them meaningful names, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app.
Link your Amazon and Villa accounts and then say "Alexa, Discover my devices."

Learn more about Villa by visiting www.villasmarthome.com
